markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Boots of Bounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3059)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 286 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The springy soles of these sturdy leather boots cushion your feet and make each step lighter. These boots give you a +5- foot item bonus to your Speed and a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) and [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37). In addition, when you use the Leap action, you can move 5 feet further if jumping horizontally or 3 feet higher if jumping vertically.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Bounding
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 286 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 340 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Bounding (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 286 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 4,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus to Speed is +10 feet, and the bonus to High Jump and Long Jump is +3.
name: Boots of Bounding (Greater)
